4 Getting Started 4.1 The Big Secret It took me about ten years of working in R to get over my fear of copying and pasting other peoples’ code. There are some great power users of R who are able to pull R code out of nowhere. The rest of us look it up, copy and paste, and modify. That is perfectly normal and acceptable behaviour. 4.1.1 Exercise Watch Tidy Tuesday video
